page.title: 16FARMING
page.content: {PRIVATE FISHING RIGHTS IN BETTYHILL } Most of the River Naver is completely controlled by the River Naver Fishery Board, which lets beats to wealthy people for large sums of money. One regular fisher on the Naver is Prince Charles. This brings in a lot of money to the proprietors but does not give much work to the locals as most of the water bailiffs and river watchers are brought in from other areas. {CLUB WATERS AND FREE FISHERIES }The tidal part of the River Naver is divided in two by the bridge. Above the bridge the water is controlled by the Bettyhill Angling Club and visitors can buy day permits for this piece of water. Below the bridge the fishing is free and excellent seatrout runs are encountered.
